text:
@realDonaldTrump 2018, 45 eliminated the Global Healthcare Team Obama created to keep us safe during a pandemic like COVID-19.
From day 1 he’s called this a hoax, blamed Democrats, said it will go away, downplayed the seriousness of the coronavirus 🦠 caused mass hysteria & his policies SUCK!!!!
